title: Nintendo Switch Gen I (moddable) + all accessories
description:
Selling my Gen1 Nintendo Switch as i have moved to a Steamdeck, prefer to deal at my location as - 
1) Easier to test the items for buyer
2) Adding lots of free items > Hard to carry around 

A few caveats listed > DO read carefully before buying!
Low ballers will not be entertained/replied
All original boxes will also be included.

Details:
1) Switch Hardware Ver: XAJ7004044XXXX - Console is unpatched, able to be hardware modded (See Pic 3 for verification)
2) Battery Capacity: Playing OCTOPATH II non-stop for 1hr38min from 99% to 50% at 50% brightness + wifi > 100% capacity should be at least 3 hours (See Pic 4 + 5 )
3) Comestic Condition: 7.8/10: As this is Gen I switch, do expect wear and tear. Adding Screen protector since Day 1, so no crack or scratches on the screen itself. (See Pic 6 for wear and tear on back of switch)
4) Functional Condition: 9/10 Tablet, 7/10 for joycon.
Switch tablet is completely fine, Both joycon has no drift; buttons are all working fine. However, left joycon‚Äôs buckle lock has chipped; this means that with adequate force, the joycon can slide out. This can be avoided by keeping the switch in an enclosed protective case like the Skull & Co gripcase or replace the buckle(See Pic 7) 
5) All accessories will be included, Dock, Charging Cable, Joycon holder, Joycon tabs. However, the original HDMI cable has been lost and a new OEM HDMI cable will be included (See Pic 8)

Extra items added:
a) Skull and Co Carrying Case + 2 different sets of replacable grips for color matching (See Pic 9 and 10; no Gripcase)
b) Used Skull and Co Thumbcaps (See switch accessories listing) 
c) Sandisk 200GB MicroSD card (See switch accessories listing;  will be inside switch) 
d) Gulikit Route + (See switch accessories listing)
e) Hard TPU switch back casing & DOBE joycon casing (See switch accessories listing) 
f) A free cartridge holder (See switch accessories listing) 

As there so many accessories, do let me know if you want them to be in their boxes or to be outside first for inspection/checking for more seamless dealing.

There will be LIVE STREAMS on Instagram @fonsus channel on 8 and 15 April at 6pm to promote this item, and more! Look out for more details here. A final live stream will be held on 21 April at 11am, where the highest bidder will win this item.

Description:
The Xbox One S is a sleek and powerful gaming console offering high-definition entertainment with HDR support and 4K Ultra HD video streaming. It features an energy-efficient design, an internal power supply, and a compact form factor that makes it ideal for any gaming setup.

Terms of sale
1) As this is a fund raising effort, we accept all bids. The winner of this item will be the highest bid on 21 April at 11am.

2) The item for sale will be available for collection from Viriya‚Äôs premises at Blk 142 Potong Pasir Ave 3 #01-224 from 21 to 25 April 9am to 6pm. Any other collection method and expense, such as courier expenses, will be borne by the buyer. 

3) All sales are final and no refunds will be provided.

4) Payment will be made to Viriya directly via this link (https://viriya.org.sg/get-involved/make-a-donation/donation-form/).

description:
This listing is part of a fund raising effort for Viriya Community Services,  and all proceeds will go to Viriya. This item is donated in full to Viriya and sold in a personal capacity by myself. 

There will be live streams on my personal channel on 15 April 7pm to 8pm to promote this item, and more! Look out for more details here. Highest bidder will win this item. 

For sale
One Nintendo Switch Gen 1, with protective screen cover installed from day one. Comes with bundled game 1-2 Switch and hard shell case.

Terms of sale
1) As this is a fund raising effort, we accept all bids. The winner of this item will be the highest bid on 15 April during the live sale.

2) The item for sale will be available for collection from Viriya's premises at Blk 142 Potong Pasir Ave 3 #01-224 from 9 to 19 April 9am to 6pm (less weekends). Any other collection method and expense, such as courier expenses, will be borne by the buyer. 

3) All sales are final and no refunds will be provided.

4) Payment will be made to Viriya directly via this link (https://viriya.org.sg/get-involved/make-a-donation/donation-form/). If you would like to make a donation without bidding, please do also use the above link to make a donation.

Pls select "Viriya Fun-d for Smiles Carnival" in the drop-down menu on the donation page.

5) If you would like to inspect the item for sale, please do so at the above address during office hours before making a bid.

More trouble than it's worth for me to fix. I suggest self collecting.

Comes with 3 controllers and the cables. WILL BUNDLE with Code Geass Lost Colors PS2 DISC and Brand new guidebook in JAPANESE as pictured for an extra $10.

title: Genki Covert Dock Mini [FREE HDMI CABLE]
description:
Condition: Preloved, 9.5/10 (FULLY FUNCTIONAL NO SCRATCHES, NO MORE BOX)

The Covert Dock Mini. 10x smaller than the original Nintendo Switch dock and charger with 4K output for all your other USB-C DisplayPort devices. Comes with USB-C 3.1 Cable.

Portable dock for travel. Nintendo Switch OLED

We didn‚Äôt think we could make an even smaller Covert Dock, but this mini charger packs a 20W punch so you‚Äôll never haver an excuse not to play some fun local multiplayer game on the big screen. Simply plug Covert Dock Mini into the wall and connect your TV and Nintendo Switch and you‚Äôre good to go - epic gaming memories on tap.

The ‚ÄòMini‚Äô is essentially the same size, if not smaller, than your typical smartphone charger but arguably more convenient with foldable prongs and a full 4K HDMI dock inside. Now that phone‚Äôs don‚Äôt even come with chargers, we think the Covert Dock Mini is the perfect option for not just gaming but all of your portable gadgets.

Ultra-Portable Design: 15x smaller than the Switch dock and charger, making it ideal for on-the-go gaming, video, and work.
High-Definition Output: 4K60 HDMI output that connects your handheld console to the TV for an enhanced visual experience.
Universal Compatibility: Functions as a game dock for Nintendo Switch, a video dock for iPhone, and a work dock for MacBook.
Powerful Charging: USB-C PD (Power Delivery) with a 20W output for fast and efficient charging of your devices.
Packing Convenience: Comes with foldable prongs to make packing and traveling more convenient.
Plug and Play: Simple connectivity for immediate use‚Äîno complicated setup required.
Quality Assured: Engineered with compactness and durability in mind for reliable performance.

Included Items:
Covert Dock Mini
Type-C to Type-C Cable
HDMI Cable

1. Wii Sports
2. Wii Fit Plus
3. Wii Sports Resort
4. WarioWare Smooth Moves
5. Funfair Party

- Sold as-is, but the set has just been tested working with another Wiimote that I have - refer to last pic.

title: Sony Playstation 4 Metal Gear Solid V Limited Edition (NON-WORKING, BLOD)
description:
Arrrr... Once you hit 40, you won't have time to do the things you love and with the mounting responsibilities at home, I'm making a decision to let go of my PS4... 

That above statement was meant for my wife if she's grilling me... I'm trying to sell it off so I can somehow make space for the new PS5 (She wouldn't be able to tell the difference because she doesn't really care... But if there's 2 consoles that's gonna be a big blip...)

Gonna throw in the following stuff as well:
1 x black controller
1x MGS edition "Diamond Dogs" controller
1 x controller charging station
MGS V game (it's a bundled item)
Bloodbourne
Need for Speed
PS4 console cover
Playstation Camera
Keyboard that attaches to the controller

Still have the box for the console and maybe the controller... I've recently changed the PSU so it's working like a charm... The only thing was that the ports are showing the age of the item as they are not as shiny as before. It's having a BLOD issue so I'm dropping the price further...

My loss your gain!

title: Nintendo Switch Lite - Pokemon Sword and Shield Version (JP Edition)
description:
Bought when it was newly released back in 2019(?) in Tokyo, BIC Camera Outlet. 
I.... admit it was an impulse buy because i liked how it looked, and i convinced myself it'll be a good pair to my OG Switch to use together on commutes etc. Sleep, in the end, was more precious during my commutes. 

It has been sitting on my shelf for ages, and am finally selling it. 
- I can't see any stain / scratches on a casual wipe down, included close up pics for you to take a look. 
- B/C the box and packaging is not in pristine condition, for those in the know, this is probably a Japanese Grade B/B+ 
- Switch has been factory reset / re-initialised 
- NOTE: the charger is a JP Plug

Feel free to schedule a time to view at my place.

7-inch OLED screen:

64 GB internal storage:

Enhanced audio:
Enjoy enhanced sound from the system‚Äôs onboard speakers when playing in Handheld and Tabletop modes

Compatibility:
Supports all Joy-Con‚Ñ¢ controllers and Nintendo Switch software*.

Three modes in one:
1. TV Mode:

2. Tabletop Mode:

Information quoted from, and pictures 1 to 7 from: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/nintendo-switch-oled-model-neon-blue-neon-red-set/

title: Xbox X console with 2 controllers
description:
Included will be:

- console
- 2 controllers
- power cable
- HD cable

Self collect only.

Buyers are required to come and test the machine before buying.


Q&As:

How old is this item?
- Xbox X was released in Nov 2020. That's as old as it can get. How long I held it for is not relevant to your purchase decision.

Why are you selling this item?
- Why I want to sell this item is not relevant to your purchase decision.

Do you have pictures of scratches? Just want to see the condition
- Showing photos of scratches will serve to decrease rather than increase your interest in buying the item. Please make an appointment to come and see the item for yourself if you want a thorough inspection. If you are looking for a used machine without any scratches, this isn't it.

Will you be interested in trading for my PS4 with some games and some cash? It is worth $450.
- I could adjust my price to $450 and achieve the same objective instead of having to spend my resources dealing with you and your item to arrive at your claim. 

Can nego to $X?
- I actually get people who ask for a reduction and as soon as their offer is accepted, they immediately don't want the item anymore. Cannot comprehend what is wrong with Singaporeans. All negotiations are off.

Can reserve for me? 
- Sale will be first come first served. I will take this off the market if you send a deposit. If you already have second thoughts over sending even a $50 deposit, you clearly have no intention of buying.
